snippet.title: SQUASER 3 Trailer
snippet.description:
This game on Steam store: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3453390/SQUASER_3/

SQUASER 3 is a unique minimalist puzzle game where your mission is to wipe away all traces of darkness. Control a white square in a world of black, white, and gray tones, clearing your path through dark labyrinths. Each level brings new challenges, demanding greater logic, memory, and precision.

Immerse yourself in this world of stark contrasts, planning each move carefully as you erase every bit of darkness to leave each level pristine. Progress from a beginner to a true erasure expert, achieving perfection on every level.

Use the mouse and the keyboard (WASD or arrow keys) to navigate through the different mazes.

In SQUASER 3:

▪️ 50 levels
▪️ Minimalist art
▪️ Simple controls
▪️ Calm, relaxing music
▪️ Achievements

Subscribe to our social networks:

Our group on Steam: https://steamcommunity.com/groups/Cute_Hanna_Games

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCr882m7TohDMwCb8osGg-Fg

Twitter: https://twitter.com/CuteHannahsGam1

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Cute-Hannahs-Games-101879351974378

Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/cutehannasgame

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/hannas_games

TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@cute_hanna_games

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/cutehanna
